stack.description: This stack contains different mean of controlling the Shadow Hand (such as a node for the Cyberglove and its remapper for the Shadow Hand). The cyberglove nodes were reimplemented by TAMS.
stack.author: Maintained by Ugo Cupcic / software@shadowrobot.com, Vlad Ciobanu: ciobanu@informatik.uni-hamburg.de, vlad.ciobanu@cti.pub.ro
